QuestData.Title: Clear!
QuestData.Description: You gotta help me fix this robot. I'm friggin' hungry!$B$BI built the Pleasure-Bot 8000 to locate Draenor truffles, and what does it do? It swims to this stupid island and shorts its power fluctuator.$B$BI got it hooked up to these batteries, but it ain't enough juice to jump it.$B$BBe a doll and get me the zapper sacs from the electric eels in the lake, would ya? They oughta be enough.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Zapper Sacs from Lakebottom Zappers in Talador.
